gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Suns 113, Heat 97
gameRecap.excerpt: The Suns defeated the Heat, 113-97. Grayson Allen recorded 31 points, a new career-high nine 3PM, and four rebounds for the Suns, with Bradley Beal adding 25 points and nine assists in the victory. Bam Adebayo tallied 28 points and 11 rebounds for the Heat in the losing effort. The Suns improve to 19-16 in the regular season, while the Heat fall to 20-15.
